name: Hermes Trismegistus
skill: Deals 1961/2341 DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority), with a very high/100% chance of inflicting Paralysis.
ability: Moderately (10%) increases the EXP gained from battle.

additional_data.description: A spirit considered to be the founder of alchemy. She's looking for a way to divide her body into three to deal with her triple personality disorder, and continues researching her condition every day. While it has a few benefits, in the end it causes trouble. Her tendency to shamelessly blame anything and everything on one of her other personalities, for example...
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Jewels and The Secret Workshop" Event: Clear Chapter 4
◦ "Jewels and The Secret Workshop" Event: Exchange for 5000 Pyroxene Shards
◦ The cost increases by 500 Shards after each exchange
(5000, 5500, 6000, 6500)
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Moderately increases the drop rate of Pyroxene Shards during the "Jewels and The Secret Workshop" event.

main: "I, I'm just a little girl! Show some modesty!"
skill: "I wonder what'll happen if I do this?"
summon: "You there! Let me examine your body! It looks absolutely intriguing!"
limit_break: "Maybe now I'll figure out how to split myself in three..."
